job.title: Software Configuration Engineer, Senior
job.description: stronguJob SummarybrbrustrongThe Senior Release Engineer is responsible for defining developing and delivering an innovative solution for our software delivery process and providing expert level knowledge on the tools and processes that constitute the SDLC The candidate will be responsible to define and implement industry standard best practices for our build and deployment pipelines leading to continuous integration and continuous delivery The candidate should be selfdriven and posses good analytical and troubleshooting skills The candidate will work with Development Quality Assurance Infrastructure security and other technical and operational teams to continuously improve the quality speed and methodologies used in delivering our capabilities to production while ensuring auditability and traceability of all changesbrbrCandidate should be able to articulate the delivery branching  merging and environment maintenance process to succeed in this position Candidate should be able to corelate their work with how it impacts business The candidate should be eager to learn new technologies flexible and work with peers to create a cohesive team environmentbrbrstronguResponsibilitiesbrustrongul liConsult with other IT teams and Business teams to deliver high quality products to test and production environmentsli liDevelop scripts and automation tools used to build integrate and deploy software releases to various platformsli liMaintains and enhances automated scriptsli liTroubleshoot complex environment software and workflow problems related to system deploymentli liMaintain advanced knowledge of development methodology processes and programming languagesli liUnderstand andor implemented cloud technologies onpremises or on cloud on GCP or Azure cloud platformsli liWorking knowledge of Python and Groovy is a mustli liCoding experience in Java Net or any software language is a mustli liGood understanding or working knowledge of DevSecOps is a big plusli liWorking knowledge of Informatica and batch processing is a big plusli liAble to create delivery metrics report on KPIs and release cadenceli liProponent of Agile transformation and lean delivery is a plusli liPresentation of the new innovations ideas or technical solutions to the Leadership team is a must haveli liAfter hours oncall support may be requiredli brbrulstronguKnowledge And Experiencebrustrongul liBSMS degree in computer science or equivalent preferredli liRequires a minimum of 5 years of Release engineering or a combination of Release and Development experience is neededli liKnowledge of coding in Java NET or any software language is requiredli liExperience taking initiatives and completing it by getting consensus with all stakeholders is preferredli liMust possess great communication and presentation skillsli liMust have experience training Junior Engineersli liMust have experience in promoting code to nonproduction and production environments andor providing installation support for deployment teamsliul
